BADGE_LIMIT_CommentCount: Number of comments to earn badge.
BADGE_LIMIT_CommentUpVotes: Number of up-votes to the user's comments to earn the badge.
BADGE_LIMIT_CommentReplies: Number of replies to the user's comments.
BADGE_LIMIT_CommentsPinned: Number of the user's comments pinned to earn the badge.
BADGE_LIMIT_Veteran: Number of years from first comment before earning the badge.
BADGE_LIMIT_NightOwl: Number of comments left at night (10PM - 5AM local time) to earn the badge.
BADGE_LIMIT_FastReplyTime: Number of replies left within 40 seconds of the parent comment, to earn the badge.
BADGE_LIMIT_RepliedToSpecificPage: Number of comments left on the provided page, or article, to earn the badge.
BADGE_LIMIT_ModeratorCommentsDeleted: Number of comments the moderator must delete to earn the badge.
BADGE_LIMIT_ModeratorCommentsApproved: Number of comments the moderator must approve to earn the badge.
BADGE_LIMIT_ModeratorCommentsUnapproved: Number of comments the moderator must un-approved to earn the badge.
BADGE_LIMIT_ModeratorCommentsReviewed: Number of comments the moderator must review to earn the badge.
BADGE_LIMIT_ModeratorCommentsMarkedSpam: Number of comments the moderator must mark spam to earn the badge.
BADGE_LIMIT_ModeratorCommentsMarkedNotSp: Number of comments the moderator must mark not spam to earn the badge.
